data.title: ShopDSi Opening
data.text: Welcome to the newly opened remade version of the Nintendo DSi Shop, ShopDSi! You can download almost every DSi Game in a .nds rom file from trustworthy sites like https://archive.org/ and others. If you have any questions, please let us know on our Discord Server: https://discord.gg/WyXESc3xG8 (Nintendo, if your reading this we are not profiting off of anything on this site, this wont hurt your company I promise.)
